title: Greenhouse System Data Acquisition Module Design Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A project-based education program for mid-level professional learners in managerial/leadership roles within corporations, conducted via mobile devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Design and integrate sensor and actuator systems required for greenhouse environmental monitoring.
Implement a data collection module and operate a real-time data logging system.
Complete the development of a greenhouse prototype with basic control functions by applying hardware-software integration principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
